articles.description: The European Central Bank ECB hashiked interest ratesby 25 basis points to 3.5%,the highest level in 22 years on Thursday.

articles.title: Spain vs Italy at UEFA Nations League semi-final: See kick-off date, time, where to watch on TV, live stre - The Economic Times
articles.description: European football rivals, Spain and Italy, meet again in the UEFA Nations League semi-finals in Enschede, Netherlands.
articles.content: Spain and Italy are readying to face off against each other in a highly anticipated semi-final match of the 2022/23 UEFA Nations League, taking place in Enschede, Netherlands. Known as two of the big… [+1619 chars]

articles.author: Leonardo S.p.A.
articles.title: Euclid, the satellite that will explore the Dark Universe, is ready for launch - Leonardo
articles.description: With Euclid, Europe consolidates its role as a global leader in the observation of the cosmos. The mission, scheduled for launch next July, will enable us to study the mechanisms of the Universe in depth, particularly dark matter and dark energy.
articles.content: Taking its name from Euclide of Alexandria, the Greek mathematician who founded the subject of geometry (reminding us that the density of matter and energy is linked to the geometry of the Universe),… [+3197 chars]
